alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 21 at 4:44AM MDT until March 23 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT MDT WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 16 inches with locally higher amounts possible in the northern Park Range. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph above 9500 feet. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains and Flat Tops. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to midnight MDT Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops
